title: Test ESC key dismisses all dialog types
description: Verify pressing ESC properly cancels confirm, choose, textInput, and questions dialogs

title: Next button should be more prominent than Cancel
description: In wizard mode, "Next" button has equal visual weight with "Cancel". Primary action should be more prominent.

title: Question divider lines too subtle in questionnaire mode
description: Divider lines between questions in questionnaire mode are too subtle. Increase visibility.

title: Add hover animation to accordion headers
description: AccordionSection header has instant hover state change. Add 0.12s easeOut transition.

title: Test speak() function with AVSpeechSynthesizer fix
description: Verify the speak() function works correctly after AVSpeechSynthesizer memory fix. Test with various voice names and rates.

title: Add secondary accent color for visual depth
description: Single blue accent (#5B8DEF) feels flat. Add secondary accent or gradient for primary actions to add visual interest.

title: Memory leak - AVSpeechSynthesizer deallocated before speech finishes
description: In speak() method at line 1681, the AVSpeechSynthesizer is a local variable that could be deallocated before speech finishes, causing a memory leak or crash.

title: Add VoiceOver support with accessibility labels
description: Missing .accessibilityLabel on all custom views. Add proper VoiceOver support for screen reader users.

title: Add hover animation to choice cards
description: SwiftUIChoiceCard has no hover animation. Add 0.15s easeOut transition on hover.

title: Inconsistent button labels across dialogs
description: Button labels differ inconsistently: "Continue" vs "Submit" vs "Confirm". Standardize terminology.

title: Accordion answered status indicator too subtle
description: Gray circle indicating answered status is too subtle in accordion mode. Make it more visible.

title: Add keyboard hints bar to all dialogs
description: Added KeyboardHintsView component showing available shortcuts (↑↓ navigate, Space select, ⏎ done, Esc cancel) at the bottom of all dialog types: confirm, choose, textInput, wizard, accordion, and questionnaire.

title: Text input focus ring too subtle
description: Input field focus ring is too subtle. Make it more visible for better usability.

title: Test multi-select shows checkboxes, single-select shows radio buttons
description: Verify visual distinction between multi-select (checkboxes) and single-select (radio) across all dialog modes

title: Disable submit button for empty required fields
description: Submit button is enabled even with empty required fields. Add validation to disable submit until required fields are filled.

title: Inconsistent answer field naming across dialog types
description: Each dialog type returns its answer under a different key, requiring parsers to guess or check multiple possibilities. Standardize the response field naming.
notes: category: script-cli\n\nUSER DECISION: Standardize to 'answer' field across all dialog types

title: Add loading state for slow API responses
description: If API takes >500ms, user is unsure if action registered. Add a loading indicator.
notes:
category: ui-swift

BACKLOG: Clarification needed - this CLI app shows modal dialogs that block until user responds. There's no async API call that would cause >500ms delay. This might refer to:
1. The MCP server taking time to process requests?
2. Future async dialog operations?

Need user direction on actual use case before implementing.

title: Insufficient bottom padding in questionnaire mode
description: Bottom padding is insufficient in questionnaire mode - buttons crowd the content.

title: Multi-select vs single-select not visually distinguished
description: Users can't tell at a glance whether a choice list allows multiple selections or just one. Add visual differentiation (checkboxes vs radio buttons).

title: Complete keyboard navigation in accordion and questionnaire dialogs
description:
Follow-up from speak-xg6. Keyboard navigation infrastructure is in place but needs:
1. Fix compilation issues in SwiftUIAccordionDialog (currently using .constant(-1) placeholder)  
2. Add full keyboard nav with Tab to switch between accordion sections
3. Add keyboard nav to SwiftUIQuestionnaireDialog

title: Distinguish cancelled vs dismissed in dialog responses
description:
"Cancelled" currently conflates two meanings:
1. Dismissing a dialog without answering (ESC, click away)
2. Actively choosing the negative option (clicking "No")

These are semantically different: one is an abort, the other is a deliberate decision. Add a field to distinguish declined (user clicked No) vs dismissed (user escaped/clicked away).
notes: category: script-cli\n\nUSER DECISION: Add 'dismissed' field. dismissed: true when ESC/closed, false when user clicked a button (including No)

title: Reduce minimum window height for simple dialogs
description: Large dead space in simple dialogs. Reduce minimum window height to fit content better.

title: Add stagger animation pattern for list items
description: List items have no stagger pattern. Add 50ms delay per item for cascading entrance effect.

title: Test reduce motion setting disables animations
description: Enable System Preferences > Accessibility > Display > Reduce motion and verify dialog animations are disabled

title: Animate text field focus ring
description: Text field border change on focus is instant. Animate over 0.12s for smoother transition.

comments.author: jurrejan
comments.text: category: ui-swift\n\nBACKLOG: StyledTextField is AppKit NSView with custom draw(). Animating focus ring requires Core Animation layer-based approach or NSAnimationContext. Low value for 0.12s transition. Defer unless user prioritizes.

title: Unify selection states across all dialog modes
description: Selection states are inconsistent across wizard, accordion, and questionnaire modes. Unify to: blue border + subtle fill + checkmark pattern.

title: NSHostingView cleanup on abnormal exit
description: Lines 1457, 1510, 1761 - NSHostingView may not be properly cleaned up on abnormal exit paths.

title: Settings reloaded from disk every dialog
description: reloadSettings() is called for every dialog, causing unnecessary disk I/O. Cache settings or use a reactive approach.

title: Establish 8px grid baseline for consistent spacing
description: Vertical rhythm varies between windows. Establish 8px grid baseline for consistent spacing across all dialogs.

title: Shift + Tab never workss
description: Should be just like tab but reverse order

title: Selection state too subtle in multiple choice dialogs
description: Selected state (e.g., Angular option) is too subtle - barely distinguishable from unselected. Add stronger background tint or left border accent on selection.

title: Add reduced motion support (@Environment accessibilityReduceMotion)
description: No @Environment(\.accessibilityReduceMotion) check anywhere - accessibility violation. Respect user's system preference for reduced motion.

title: Duplicate Codable logic (40+ lines)
description: Lines 41-163 contain duplicate Codable logic that should be consolidated.

title: Wizard progress bar segments lack visual distinction
description: Progress bar segment colors are too similar (completed vs remaining). Consider progress dots for 2-step wizards or increase color contrast.

title: Add opacity transition to accordion content
description: Accordion content pops in instantly. Add .transition(.opacity) for smoother appearance.

title: Cancel button text has low contrast
description: "Cancel" button text is too light - low contrast for accessibility. Increase text contrast to 4.5:1 minimum.

title: Increase touch target size for checkmarks (22px -> 28px+)
description: Checkmark circle is 22px, should be 28px+ per Fitts's Law for comfortable clicking.

title: Test dialog-cli compiles and runs after Codable refactor
description: Verify choose and questions dialogs work after consolidating SelectedValue/AnswerValue into StringOrStrings

title: Green checkmark clashes with blue accent palette
description: Green checkmark in accordion mode clashes with the blue accent color palette. Consider using blue checkmark or unifying the color scheme.

title: Test VoiceOver reads dialog elements correctly
description: Enable VoiceOver and verify labels are read correctly for buttons, choice cards, progress bars, and dialogs

title: Accordion auto-advances to next section on single-select
description: Added auto-advance behavior: when selecting an option in single-select accordion section, automatically expands the next section after 150ms delay.

title: Add ESC key support to dismiss dialogs
description: Users can't press ESC to cancel dialogs - this is a standard macOS pattern that users expect.

title: TEST: Verify dialog-cli compiles after refactoring
description: Compile dialog-cli.swift to verify all refactoring changes work together

title: Redundant checkmark on selected choice cards
description: Selection state checkmark icon inside the choice card is redundant when the card already has blue highlight. Remove one indicator.

comments.author: jurrejan
comments.text: category: ui-swift\n\nREVIEWED: The selection indicator (checkbox/radio) serves a functional purpose - it communicates whether multi-select is allowed. Removing it would hurt usability. The blue highlight + indicator is a common pattern in modern UIs. Closing as won't-fix unless user disagrees.

title: Force unwrap crash risk on selectedIndices.first!
description: At choose() line 1498, selectedIndices.first! could crash if the array is empty. Use safe unwrapping instead.

title: Add keyboard navigation for choice cards
description: Choice cards only respond to mouse clicks, blocking accessibility users. Add arrow key navigation and Enter/Space to select.
notes:
category: ui-swift

- Added KeyboardNavigationMonitor class for event handling

comments.author: jurrejan
comments.text:
category: ui-swift

Requires significant refactor:
1. Add @FocusState to all dialog views
2. Add focusedIndex state variable
3. Pass isFocused to SwiftUIChoiceCard
4. Add .focusable() and arrow key handlers
5. Handle Enter/Space to select

This is cross-cutting - affects 5+ views. Better as dedicated session.

title: Response lacks context about dialog type
description: Without correlating back to the original call, a parser can't interpret the response correctly. A confirmation's negative response looks like an aborted text input. Include dialog type in response.
notes: category: script-cli\n\nUSER DECISION: Use field name 'dialogType' with values: confirm, choose, textInput, notify, questions

title: Hardcoded window dimensions (420x480, 420x600, 460x650)
description: Dialog methods use hardcoded window dimensions. Consider making these configurable or calculating based on content.
notes: category: ui-swift\n\nUser confirmed: calculate window size from content (message/choices length). This is a larger refactor but approved.

title: Test keyboard navigation works in choose and wizard dialogs
description: Verify arrow keys navigate options, Space selects, and focus ring displays correctly in SwiftUIChooseDialog and SwiftUIWizardDialog.
